attributes.action: not allow the BBC to provide coverage of the Glastonbury Festival or any other live music event  due to the fact that this year's coverage of Glastonbur yis incompetent beyond belief.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
What more to say ?  Coverage dedicated to minor, out of tune bands and ridiculous illiterate presenters.  "Live" acts shown on one channel simultaneously with interviews with the same band about their performance on another channel.  
If they can't be bothered to show this sort of event properly let someone else do it.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
